description: Full name of the amino acid
Three letter symbol of the amino acid
Single letter symbol of the amino acid

column: Mutation id. This can be joined 'key' column in the 'vcf_key' table.

description: Depending on the annotation, this may be: Transcript ID (preferably using version number)
The bare minimum is at least a description on whether the transcript is ['Coding', 'Noncoding']. Whenever possible, use ENSEMBL biotypes.
If variant is coding, this field describes the variant using HGVS notation (Protein level). Since transcript ID is already mentioned in 'feature ID', it may be omitted here.
Number of coding bases (one based includes START and STOP codons)
Number of amino acide (including START, but not STOP).
Distance to feature: All items in this field are options, so the field could be empty

Add errors, warnings or informative message that can affect annotation accuracy. It can be added using either 'codes' or 'message types'. All these errors, warnings or information messages messages are optional.
